channel.title: Windows lulz
channel.description:
Well We've all had a few down the line, then some of us said no, no more and welcomed some other operating system. My point being is on wednesday derp was installing a new printer on derps laptop (Vista) and it came up with an error message and your choices were to either get help or ignore it, so we went to get help (not needing but for the lulz) and this is what it said.
There is a problem with Windows. The cause is Windows, which is created by the Microsoft corporation; for which there is no solution.
So tell me about your lulz...
(there is a solution, install linux)

item.title: Windows lulz
item.dc:creator: @runescape3dude runescape3dude
item.description:
@runescape3dude wrote:

[quote=“Speljohan, post:11, topic:243424”]Ok, so i downloaded and installed it. First of all: The UI is SHIT to work in, you get fucking annoyed by it’s retardedness every minute, you can’t even change to an old taskbar instead of this piece of shit. Secondly, ribbon layout is made for niggers and ruins everything. Thirdly, it doesn’t even differ from vista in many aspects at all.

Conclusion: Shit.

A little picture to illustrate how i feel:
[/quote]
I agree with the paint (That is why I imported the old paint from XP) aspect and the UI. But, it does run faster than Vista…

Read full topic

item.title: Windows lulz
item.dc:creator: @Holic Holic
item.description:
@Holic wrote:

Cheese_Police:

linux just simply is not meant for the common idiot, its more of a hobby os kind of thing

Finally someone agrees, I always get lol’d at when I say that.

Speljohan:

You mean the UI is fucking horrible. I haven’t tested the actual functionality yet, so can’t bitch about that

The speed is amazing compared to Vista, and even XP, and I’m on a shitty 6 year old computer.
The UI might be ugly to you, but it works really well. I suggest you try it.

Read full topic

item.title: Windows lulz
item.dc:creator: @TeleNubby TeleNubby
item.description:
@TeleNubby wrote:

[quote=“runescape3dude, post:6, topic:243424”][quote author=Speljohan link=topic=319739.msg2533374#msg2533374 date=1226608810]

You can say what you want, but at the moment Vista is the most user friendly OS. I don’t see a retard using Linux, but with Vista you can just plug in your shit and it works, unless you are retarded. This will change, because many OEM company’s start installing a Linux distro as the main OS. So in a few years hardware producers will realise that they should focus more on writing drivers for Linux.

I am running windows 7 atm… It runs a lot faster than vista. + Linux works really well. It is just slightly too easy to fuck up.

I was about to call you a fucking retard, but then I Googled it. Looks pretty cool.
[/quote]You mean the UI is fucking horrible. I haven’t tested the actual functionality yet, so can’t bitch about that

30 minutes[/quote]What?

Read full topic

item.title: Windows lulz
item.dc:creator: @runescape3dude runescape3dude
item.description:
@runescape3dude wrote:

[quote=“Speljohan, post:5, topic:243424”][quote author=RXVL link=topic=319739.msg2533352#msg2533352 date=1226608269]

You can say what you want, but at the moment Vista is the most user friendly OS. I don’t see a retard using Linux, but with Vista you can just plug in your shit and it works, unless you are retarded. This will change, because many OEM company’s start installing a Linux distro as the main OS. So in a few years hardware producers will realise that they should focus more on writing drivers for Linux.

I am running windows 7 atm… It runs a lot faster than vista. + Linux works really well. It is just slightly too easy to fuck up.

I was about to call you a fucking retard, but then I Googled it. Looks pretty cool.
[/quote]You mean the UI is fucking horrible. I haven’t tested the actual functionality yet, so can’t bitch about that :([/quote]
The UI looks horrible at first, and it still does, but it is easy to use. It also boots about 30 minutes faster than Vista.

Read full topic
